ygData.subject: Re: Spell Sentinel
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Actually the view area of sentinal is so small that using it like that won t give enough time to make any difference. Instead place it in tunnels (it is
ygData.messageBody:
At 08:43 PM 5/9/99 -0400, you wrote:
>From: "Bit Net" <dante@...>
>

Actually the view area of sentinal is so small that using it like that won't
give enough time to make any difference.
Instead place it in tunnels (it is palced where you cast it) and it will
warn you of incoming trains or stuff creeping up behind you or on the other
spawn spot if youa re watching two.

Alliance is a faction spell but not a combat one. It however does so little
to change factiosn that it is currently considered broken by most
enchanters. Or at elast no one has ever noticed the faction change.


>Ok, how about alliance?..I thought this added an NPC Faction to a fight but
>I must be mistaken...I tried it but the NPC I cast it on just sat there..
>
>Thanks of the Info..
>
>Jim
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: WeinisFROG@... <WeinisFROG@...>
>To: eqenchanters@onelist.com <eqenchanters@onelist.com>

>>

>>that way it gives a chance to get up and run away
